applied_rules: Art Study 007 reference for painterly style

conflicts_resolved.conflict: Pixel art vs painterly style mid-session
conflicts_resolved.resolution: User preferred painterly after seeing Forest Temple reference
conflicts_resolved.outcome: Complete visual rewrite to painterly gradients

violations.description: Built all visuals in game.js with draw() methods inside classes
violations.why: Didn't load architecture doc before implementation
violations.consequence: Required ~40 minute refactor to extract to theme.js

result_quality.notes: Visuals excellent (painterly style worked great), audio incomplete (stubs only)

result_notes: Painterly style using Art Study 007 reference produced cohesive, beautiful result
Gravity wells added genuine gameplay depth - not just an Asteroids clone
Game is challenging but fair - 'hard but fun' per user
Modular refactor proved the architecture pattern works
Lives system required changes across 5+ locations
keep_for_future: Use existing art studies as explicit style references
getState() pattern cleanly separates game logic from rendering
Centralized SETTINGS object for all tunable values
Proof-of-fun checkpoint before investing in visuals
Warm/cool color harmony for space themes (golden bullets, cool ship)
Radial gradients with offset center for 3D-ish rocks
Iterating on user feedback quickly builds trust
avoid_for_future: Building ANY visual code in game.js - always use theme.js
Hardcoding values that should be in SETTINGS
Leaving HTML HUD elements when using canvas-based UI
Skipping architecture doc load before implementation phase
Leaving audio as stubs - complete in same session

time_metrics.notes: Refactor cost ~40 minutes that could have been avoided

creative_additions.description: Large asteroids may contain gravity wells that spawn when destroyed, pulling ship and bullets
creative_additions.impact: Adds strategic depth - can use wells to curve shots or get pulled into danger

creative_additions.description: Rapid kills build multiplier up to 10x, resets on timeout or death
Hold space to charge, release for powerful shot
creative_additions.impact: Adds timing skill, satisfying to land charged shots
